movie_title: How the language of menus matters ⏲️ 6 Minute English
introduction: Restaurants have often used French terms to make food sound more exciting, but could this be going o

vocabulary.example: The restaurant offers an exotic menu with dishes from around the world.

vocabulary.definition: having a refined knowledge or appreciation of the arts, culture, etc.
vocabulary.example: The wine connoisseur was known for his sophisticated taste in choosing rare wines.
The dessert menu was full of tempting options like rich chocolate cake and creamy tiramisu.
The restaurant's new marketing strategy proved to be highly profitable, increasing their revenue significantly.

vocabulary.definition: unable to think clearly or understand
vocabulary.example: The complex directions on the menu left the diners feeling confused about what to order.

vocabulary.definition: a strong desire to know or learn something
vocabulary.example: The chef's innovative cooking style sparked curiosity among the diners, eager to taste his unique creations.
